document_data.mainbody:
Rye bread was a type of dense, darkly colored bread made from rye. It was often served alongside Dragons Breath Beer.
Rye bread was known to be served at the Bowels of the Earth tavern in Waterdeep and the restaurant The Painted Boat near Ravens Bluff.
Rye was a popular type of bread among many travelers in the Sword Coast due to maintaining freshness for a prolonged period of time.It was often served alongside Dragons Breath Beer.
